name: Goya's Inferno (niadocraz)
description:
Goya's Inferno is a horizontal shoot-em-up inspired by Goya's paintings.

Play with different Witches to defeat the evil creatures of your nightmare

Features

  • Hand-drawn 2D animation
  • Three playable witches, each with her own playstyle
  • Test your skills in the Boss Fights!
  • Beat all levels to unlock Hard and Insane difficulty modes
  • Survival Mode: defeat enemy waves and get the best score

Play with keyboard or controller (xbox 360/one or ps4 should work fine)

Team

  • Sergi Cugat (@MajorSergi) 
  • Daniel Zarco (@niadocraz)
